subject: Missing Haptic and failed shipment, order # SSN3533
description_text:
I have connected with support on order # SSN3533.  They attempted shipping
the missing 3rd VAM Pro haptic motor but the shipment has been marked as
unknown since day 2 (
https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047120845374).  I’m hoping to receive the
final haptic motor I paid for, please help.

Thank you,
Peter

conversations.body_text: Hi Peter Krengel,  Rest assured, our operations team will handle your issue. However, due to the current backlog of emails, responses may be slightly delayed.
Hi Peter Krengel,    Don't worry, we've already reshipped your order.
